title: Sanitary Pad Distribution
paras: Sanitary Napkin Distribution drive in 2 camps for families affected by Baghjan Oil field blow out and flood in Assam. Locations: Rupkonwar M.E school and Baghjan ME school.

A fire broke out of a well few days back in this area. The fire is still on with tremors being felt on a daily basis. Incessant rainfall has now led to flooding in the campsite.This drive was executed Onground  by Janman People Foundation. Our team also Distributed sanitary pad to female Migrants worker going back home.

title: Covid-19 Relief
paras: Where we went beyond our area of relief work to help an abandoned aged person.
We learnt about an unknown person who was left abandoned on the streets of Karol Bagh in Delhi. He was lying on the footpath in an extremely famished & miserable state, in torn & soiled clothes.

Our team members Chandrajeet Kumar Gupta and Shourya Roy got him admitted in RML hospital where he got treatment for a week and after discharge, we got him admitted to T.E.S.F, who will take care of him until his last day, with full honour & dignity.
We were able to get uncle treated in the hospital and then admit him in The Earth Saviour Foundation.
